description: A mapping used by Glue to extract findings from a security tool report
title: Mapping

___app_name.description: Path to the property in the report file that contains the target app name

___task_name.description: The name of the task (tool) the produce those findings

___key.description: The key in the JSON report to an array that contains findings

___properties.description: The mapping between the items in the array and Glue's findings

___description.description: The path on the array item to extract the description

___fingerprint.description: The path on the array item to extract the fingerprint

___severity.description: The path on the array item to extract the severity

___detail.description: The path on the array item to extract the details

___source.description: The path on the array item to extract the source
